name: weeding-backend-dev
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.deploy:local: sam package --profile dev --resolve-s3 --config-env local && sam deploy --profile dev --resolve-s3 --config-env local && npm install
scripts.deploy:local:full: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run prepack && npm run package && npm run deploy:local
